# Character Sheet

## OnceWas RPG Character Generator

Creating a character for *OnceWas RPG* has never been easier! Our online character generator streamlines the process, allowing you to quickly build a hero ready for adventure. Whether you're a seasoned player or brand new to the world of *OnceWas*, this tool ensures you have everything you need to get started.

## Features of the Character Generator:

- **Quick & Easy Creation** – Generate a complete character in just a few clicks.  
- **Customizable Options** – Choose your ancestry, class, and background to shape your character’s story.  
- **Equipment & Spells** – Automatically selects starting gear and spells based on your character’s abilities.  
- **Level Adjustments** – Create characters of any level, perfect for one-shots or ongoing campaigns.  
- **Printable & Digital Sheets** – Save your character as a PDF or access it online during gameplay.
